downloadTitle: Forefront Unified Access Gateway (UAG) Content Series - Remote Desktop Services (RDS) Publishing Solution Guide
downloadDescription: Forefront UAG Content Series - RDS Publishing Solution Guide
detailsSection:
RDS facilitates the sharing of applications and desktops over the network, enabling users to access Windows-based programs that are installed on a Remote Desktop Session Host (RD Session Host) or the Windows desktop itself, from a range of computing devices.  You can use Forefront UAG to provide remote client access to an RD Session Host to run programs on that server using RemoteApps, or clients connect to a remote desktop. 

This solution guide provides an overview of RDS publishing, a summary of the advantages of publishing RDS via Forefront UAG; planning information; and detailed deployment steps. It is also available online at the Forefront UAG TechCenter (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd861391.aspx).
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.

relatedResourcesSection.title: remote Desktop Services (RDS) Publishing Solution Guide
